properties.name: spring.sqltoy.sqlResourcesDir
properties.description: 扫描sql文件资源路径,多个用逗号分隔,scan path for *.sql.xml resources

properties.name: spring.sqltoy.debug
properties.description: open or close debug mode for develop,is true 会打印执行sql

properties.name: spring.sqltoy.unifyFieldsHandler
properties.description: 统一对createBy、createTime、updateBy、updateTime 进行赋值的扩展实现

properties.name: spring.sqltoy.batchSize
properties.description: 非必选项,批量执行默认每个批次提交的记录数量

properties.name: spring.sqltoy.printSqlTimeoutMillis
properties.description: 非必选项,慢sql执行超过多少毫秒则打印,默认30秒

properties.name: spring.sqltoy.defaultDataSource
properties.description: 非必选项,指定sqltoy框架默认指定的数据源

properties.name: spring.sqltoy.reservedWords
properties.description: 兼容数据库保留字处理,设置当前项目误用到的保留字,多个用逗号分隔

properties.name: spring.sqltoy.functionConverts
properties.description: 跨数据库方言适配扩展函数

properties.name: spring.sqltoy.elastic.defaultId
properties.description: elasticsearch 多个连接集群下的默认连接id

properties.name: spring.sqltoy.elastic.endpoints[0].url
properties.description: es集群url地址,多个节点用逗号分隔

properties.name: spring.sqltoy.elastic.endpoints[0].version
properties.description: es集群的版本 ,sqltoy会根据版本确定是否支持sql
